name: Eurocode 1: Actions on Structures - Part 1-1: General Actions
description: Eurocode 1 Part 1-1 provides general rules for actions on structures including dead loads, live loads, and environmental actions.

rules.name: Dead Loads - Self Weight
rules.description: Self-weight of structural and non-structural elements shall be considered

actions.message: Self-weight of structural elements must be calculated and considered per EN 1991-1-1-3.1.1

rules.name: Imposed Loads - Floor Areas
rules.description: Imposed loads for floor areas shall be determined according to use

actions.message: Floor areas must have minimum imposed load of 2.0 kN/m² per EN 1991-1-1-3.2.1

rules.name: Roof Loads - Snow Loads
rules.description: Snow loads on roofs shall be determined according to location and roof geometry

actions.message: Snow loads on roofs must be calculated according to location and geometry per EN 1991-1-1-3.3.1

rules.name: Wind Loads - Basic Wind Velocity
rules.description: Basic wind velocity shall be determined for the site location

actions.message: Basic wind velocity must be determined for the site location per EN 1991-1-1-3.4.1

rules.name: Thermal Actions - Temperature Changes
rules.description: Thermal actions due to temperature changes shall be considered

actions.message: Thermal actions due to temperature changes should be considered per EN 1991-1-1-3.5.1

rules.name: Combination of Actions - Fundamental Combination
rules.description: Actions shall be combined according to fundamental combination rules

actions.message: Actions must be combined according to fundamental combination rules per EN 1991-1-1-4.1.1

rules.name: Load Reduction - Large Floor Areas
rules.description: Load reduction for large floor areas shall be applied

actions.message: Load reduction should be applied for floor areas larger than 50 m² per EN 1991-1-1-5.1.1

rules.name: Dynamic Effects - Vibration
rules.description: Dynamic effects due to vibration shall be considered

actions.message: Dynamic effects due to vibration should be considered per EN 1991-1-1-6.1.1

rules.name: Accidental Actions - Impact Loads
rules.description: Accidental actions such as impact loads shall be considered

actions.message: Accidental actions such as impact loads must be considered per EN 1991-1-1-7.1.1

rules.name: Seismic Actions - Earthquake Loads
rules.description: Seismic actions shall be determined according to seismic zone

actions.message: Seismic actions must be determined for buildings in seismic zones per EN 1991-1-1-8.1.1
